Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
A wide melee slash that hits multiple units in front of the user.
大范围近战砍击，能够攻击使用者前方多个单位。
Shoot intense flames in a 2 hex cone.
向 2 个扇形单元格范围喷射剧烈火焰。
Unit tunnels to target hex, erupting from the earth and dealing damage to all adjacent units.
单位挖掘隧道前往目标单元格并从地底冲出，对所有相邻单位造成伤害。
Maw attack that crushes a target.
可以粉碎目标的啃咬攻击。
有 {SwallowwholeSTRchance} 力量几率[abilityred]吞噬[/abilityred]轻型单位。
Launch a crystal that bursts in electricity, dealing Arc damage in a {hexrad} hex radius. If there are any Mineral units in this area, they heal for {Hpcrystalheal} instead.
发射能够迸发出电流的水晶，对 {hexrad} 个单元格范围造成伤害。如果范围内存在任何矿物单位，这些单位将治疗 {Hpcrystalheal}。
At the start of this unit's turn, non-Mineral units in a 3 hex radius of this unit suffer [abilityred]Static Charge[/abilityred].
该单位回合开始时，位于其 3 个单元格范围内的非矿物单位受到[abilityred]静电电荷[/abilityred]。
Discharge an arc current at the target, damaging them and then jumping to new targets within {hexrangejump} hexes up to {jumptimes} times.
向目标释放电弧电流，伤害目标且电弧电流随后将弹跳至目标 {hexrangejump} 个单元格范围内的其他目标，最多弹跳 {jumptimes} 次。
The crystal destabilizes further and explodes, dealing Arc damage to adjacent units.
水晶变得愈发不稳定，接着将会爆炸，对相邻单位造成电弧伤害。
A slash with a vine tentacle.
Spit balls of molten rock at the target.
Discharge an Arc pulse that also jumps to {ExtraTargeters} extra targets within a {Radius} hex range of the original.
释放电弧脉冲攻击初始目标，电弧还会额外弹跳至初始目标 {Radius} 个单元格范围内 {ExtraTargeters} 个目标。
Throw a chunk of crystalized Arc, damaging units in a {Hexrad} hex radius.
投掷一大块晶化电弧，伤害 {Hexrad} 个单元格范围内的单位。
Throw a chunk of magma, damaging units in a {Hexrad} hex radius and creating a Thermal Hazard on the ground.
投掷一大块熔岩，伤害 {Hexrad} 个单元格范围内的单位并在地面制造热能灾害。

This unit's attacks have a {BurnChance} strength chance to cause [abilityred]Burning[/abilityred] to non-Mineral and non-Ethereal targets for {BurnTurn}. At the start of this unit's turn, adjacent enemy units take {InfusionAdjacentDamage} damage, and adjacent Flame Quartzite units heal for {InfusionHeal}.
该单位的攻击有 {BurnChance} 力量几率对非矿物和非虚灵目标造成[abilityred]燃烧[/abilityred]，持续 {BurnTurn}。该单位回合开始时，与其相邻的敌方单位会受到 {InfusionAdjacentDamage} 伤害，与其相邻的火焰石英岩兽单位则会治疗 {InfusionHeal}。
The unit's attacks have a {BurnChance} strength chance to cause [abilityred]Burning[/abilityred] to non-Mineral and non-Ethereal targets for {BurnTurn}.
该单位的攻击有 {BurnChance} 力量几率对非矿物和非虚灵目标造成[abilityred]燃烧[/abilityred]，持续 {BurnTurn}。
This unit's attacks have a {StunChance} strength chance to cause [abilityred]Stunned[/abilityred] to non-Ethereal targets for {StunTurn}.
该单位的攻击有 {StunChance} 力量几率使非虚灵目标[abilityred]晕眩[/abilityred]，持续 {StunTurn}。
This unit is superior to others of its kind. It has +{MutationMorale}[happiness/], +{ResistanceStatus} resistance to all status effects, and is {EvasionPercentage}% harder to hit.
此单位比其他同类级别更高，拥有 +{MutationMorale}[happiness/]、+{ResistanceStatus} 所有状态效果抵抗且命中难度增加 {EvasionPercentage}%。
This unit is better than others of its kind. It has +{MutationMorale}[happiness/], +{ResistanceStatus} resistance to all status effects, and is {EvasionPercentage}% harder to hit.
此单位比其他同类更强，拥有 +{MutationMorale}[happiness/]、+{ResistanceStatus} 所有状态效果抵抗且命中难度增加 {EvasionPercentage}%。

This unit is carrying a plague, causing adjacent Biological and Cyborg enemy units to take {ContaminationHaloDamage} damage at the end of this unit's turn, with a {BlightPlagueChance} strength chance of applying [abilityred]Blighted Plague[/abilityred]. This gives the enemy unit -{BlightMorale}, -{BlightAcc} accuracy on attacks and causes them to take {BlightDamage} damage per [turn/].
该单位携带瘟疫。该单位回合结束时，相邻敌方生物和半机械人单位受到 {ContaminationHaloDamage} 伤害，并有 {BlightPlagueChance} 力量几率对其施加[abilityred]枯萎瘟疫[/abilityred]，使敌方单位 -{BlightMorale}和 -{BlightAcc} 攻击准度，并且每[turn/]受到 {BlightDamage} 伤害。
This unit's melee attacks have a {ContaminatedChance} strength chance to cause [abilityred]Poisoned[/abilityred] to Biological and Cyborg units for {Poisonturn}
该单位的近战攻击有 {ContaminatedChance} 力量几率使生物和半机械人单位[abilityred]中毒[/abilityred]，持续 {Poisonturn}。
Hardened claws give this unit's melee attacks one level of [abilityred]Stagger Impact[/abilityred] and a {BleedChance} strength chance to cause [abilityred]Bleeding[/abilityred].
强化镰刃爪能够给予该单位 1 级[abilityred]动摇冲击[/abilityred]，并有 {BleedChance} 力量几率造成[abilityred]流血[/abilityred]。
These unit's claws are sharper than others, giving this unit's melee attacks a {BleedChance} strength chance to cause [abilityred]Bleeding[/abilityred].
这些单位的爪子锋利无比，使该单位的近战攻击有 {BleedChance} 力量几率造成[abilityred]流血[/abilityred]。

This unit is infected with an experimental virus that brings the dead back to life. When it is killed, it comes back to life {GhoulingTurns} later with {Ghoulinghealth}[hp/], -{GhoulingArmorReduction}, and its attacks deal +{GhoulingDamage} damage.[br/][br/][firecol]A unit can only revive itself once per battle.[/firecol]
该单位被一种能够起死回生的实验病毒所感染。该单位被击杀时，将在 {GhoulingTurns} 后以 {Ghoulinghealth}[hp/] 和 -{GhoulingArmorReduction} 的状态复活，但攻击能够造成 +{GhoulingDamage} 伤害。[br/][br/][firecol]每个单位在每场战斗中只能复活自己一次。[/firecol]
This unit has been revived by Infection X. It has less [armor/], but deals more damage.
该单位已被 X 传染病复活，拥有更低[armor/]但会造成更多伤害。
Melee attack with a sharp beak.
使用尖锐的喙发动近战攻击。
Spit blazing saliva at a target.
向目标喷吐燃烧的唾液。
Spew fire in a 2 hex cone.
向 2 个单元格扇形范围喷吐火焰。
{Bonus} damage against Burning or Immolated targets.
对燃烧或焚祭目标额外造成 {Bonus} 伤害。
Heal {amount} when attacking Cyborg or Mechanical units.
攻击半机械人或机械单位时治疗 {amount}。
Unit gains {ScutumFormationAmount} when it is adjacent to a friendly unit with Chelus Formation.
当单位与处于蛇颈龟阵型中的友方单位相邻时，获得 {ScutumFormationAmount}。
Remove all non-Psionic negative Status Effects from this unit and adjacent friendly units, as well as healing them for {NestCohesionAmount}.
移除该单位及其相邻友方单位身上所有的非灵能负面状态效果，同时治疗这些单位 {NestCohesionAmount}。
Spawn an egg next to the unit. The egg will hatch into a Chelus Youngling next turn.
在单位旁生成一个龟蛋，龟蛋将会在下回合孵化成蛇颈龟幼崽。
The Chelus egg will hatch next turn. If the egg is destroyed, there is a 50% it will still hatch, but only with 50% of the maximum [hp/] of a natural hatch.
蛇颈龟蛋将在下回合孵化。如果龟蛋被摧毁，仍然有 50% 的几率孵化成功，但[hp/]只有正常孵化出来的幼崽的 50%。
Crashes against a target within melee range.
粉碎近战范围内的一个目标。
This unit casts Song of Swiftness at the beginning of its first turn in combat.
该单位将在战斗的第一回合开始时吟唱迅捷之歌。
The Octowhale Elder sings to its allies, increasing their movement speed and making them {EvasiveSong} harder to hit.[br/]Cancels Song of Aggression.
八爪鲸长老向同盟吟唱歌曲，提升同盟的移动速度并使其命中难度增加 {EvasiveSong}。[br/]这将取消侵略之歌。
This unit has Fast Movement speed and is {EvasiveSong} harder to hit.
该单位拥有快速移动速度且命中难度增加 {EvasiveSong}。

The Octowhale Elder sings to its allies, granting their melee attacks a {SongConcussionSTR} strength chance to [abilityred]Disable[/abilityred]. In addition, their ranged attacks gain {CritSong} increased critical hit chance.[br/]Cancels Song of Swiftness.
八爪鲸长老向同盟吟唱歌曲，使同盟的近战攻击有 {SongConcussionSTR} 力量几率施加[abilityred]瘫痪[/abilityred]。此外，同盟远程攻击的暴击率增加 {CritSong}。[br/]这将取消迅捷之歌。
This unit's melee attacks have a chance to Disable, and its ranged attacks have {CritSong} increased critical hit chance.
该单位的近战攻击有几率瘫痪目标，远程攻击的暴击率增加 {CritSong}。
A repeating melee attack with a beak.
使用啄进行的重复攻击。
The Penguin jumps, damaging far away or Flying units.
企鹅跃向空中，伤害远处或飞行单位。
{WaterDamage} damage and {RangeIncrease} range in water battles.
在水中战斗时造成 {WaterDamage} 伤害并拥有 {RangeIncrease} 范围。
Penguins gain {IncMorale} when fighting in Arctic terrain.
在极寒地形战斗时，企鹅获得 {IncMorale}。
Produce invigorating sounds by rubbing limbs together, granting this unit and friendly units within {hexrad} hexes +{InvStridMorale} morale and Fast Movement for {StridTurn}.
通过摩擦肢体制造亢奋的鸣叫，赋予该单位和 {hexrad} 个单元格内的友方单位 +{InvStridMorale} 士气和快速移动，持续 {StridTurn}。
This unit has {InvStridMorale} morale and Fast Movement.
该单位拥有 {InvStridMorale} 士气和快速移动。
Create a sonic boom by slashing the air incredibly quickly, directing a damaging shockwave at the enemy.
以极快的速度劈砍空气制造声波爆炸，向敌人施放冲击波并造成伤害。
Spit a blob of Biochemical goo at a target unit.
向目标单位喷吐一团生化黏液。
Spit a Biochemical agent at a target unit.
向目标单位喷吐生化剂。

A unit that is Devoured or Swallowed Whole, that didn't die during the process, can be retrieved if the unit who ate it is killed before it devours another unit or uses the [abilityred]Spawn Larva[/abilityred] ability.
被吞食或被生吞的单位在过程中不会死亡，如果吃掉该单位的单位在吞食其他单位或使用[abilityred]孵化幼虫[/abilityred]技能之前被击杀，则该单位将能从中逃脱。

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text. You and Your might be examples of this.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
